divs: Sighting Detailsit was like wow at first the bong wouldnt hit and then the aliens came down andtalked to us and they were like, can we take a hit of that and we said sure.then they took the BIGGEST HIT i ahve ever seen. holy shit man. and then theyleft and we laughed them a good bye.
